title: Get all LAP TIME Nodes
user_story:
As an API consumer
I want to be able to load all LAP TIMES at once
So I can find out which even exist
And to be able to compare and analyze them without having to load them all individually
description:
* A list of all LAP TIME nodes is returned when there exists at least 1. -> Status Code \`200\`
* When no LAP TIMES exist then an empty list is returned. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Each returned list item contains all specified properties (see corresponding 'epic' ticket).
* Properties are returned, even when they are empty (optional fields). They are returned with value \`null\`.
